creator: fabrice.blondeau@arisem.com
text:
The system up / down is very convenient in the http request sampler for example, it would be really handy to have this system to prioritize or order assertions in response assertion sampler.

thx

Fabrice

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text: Can you confirm you want addition of up/down buttons in Response Assertion ?

yes i confirm
